title: League of Legends Patch
body: I just downloaded League on this computer and im having a tough time finishing the patch. It stops on 99% on top and bottom on step 2. It will stop at random times and go up a second every few minutes. I've tried everything to fix it. I've read the forums and none of the solutions have been working. I've even waited overnite for it to load. It just won't work. PLEASE HELP!!

replies.body: It's still not working. Do you have any other solutions to the problem? I am currently reinstalling League to see if that will work. I will comment back if it works.

Hi DesertSpirit!

I appreciate you taking the time to bring this issue to the Help and Support Community!  Unfortunately, most error messages you experience while patching can be completely ambiguous, such as "An unexpected error has occurred".  

However, most every single Error Message you encounter (at least at 33% and beyond), usually indicates an issue with downloading required installation files from our Servers.  Commonly, people experience issues downloading files when overzealous 3rd party security programs deem League of Legends a "threat", and cut off the connection to ensure no more files are downloaded to your computer.  This will either generate an error message, or just stop the download altogether.  To that end, make sure that you follow all of the steps in the following Knowledge Base Article in hopes of resolving this issue:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/22114820-Firewall-Configuration-for-League-of-Legends

If after completing all of the steps found there, and if you are still experiencing issues, then I strongly recommend that you submit a new [Support Ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) to us here in Player Support and include the following logs to give us an idea of your Network Configuration:

1) Network Analysis: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20103436-obtaining-a-network-analysis

2) NetworkInfo Log: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20132863-obtaining-a-networkinfo-log

3) Process List: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20132988-obtaining-a-process-list
This didn't help. It's still freezing up. I really wan't league but it keeps freezing.

Sorry to hear that this is still occurring.  Once again, make sure that you submit a new Ticket as linked in my previous post.  By including all of the requested information, we should be able to investigate this issue and provide a solution!

We look forward from hearing from you!
